title: Navimow
description:
Segway Navimow is an advanced robotic mower that uses a virtual boundary, eliminating the need for complicated perimeter wiring. Easy to operate and manage, Navimow gives you more free time to do the things you love and an effortlessly impeccable lawn with every use. 
With the help of Navimow app, you can:
1. Easily install and activate the device by following the detailed tutorials.
2. Create a virtual working zone for your mower. Understand your lawn area and create a corresponding map. Just remote control the mower to set up the boundary, off-limit area, and channel. Even multiple lawn areas can be managed at your fingertip. 
3. Set the mowing schedule. You can either choose to use the recommended schedule auto-generated based on your preferences or select the mowing time by yourself. 
4. Monitor the mower at any time. You can check the mower status, mowing progress, remote control the mower to start or stop working whenever you want. 
5. Personalize features and settings. Features like the cutting height, work mode can be adjusted with just a few clicks. 

Should you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to send an Email to: support-navimow@rlm.segway.com
To know more about Navimow models and technical details, please visit our website: https://navimow.segway.com
